attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500

attributes.description: Excellent Condition Volkswagen Polo Comfortline, One owner from new with full service history and spare key available. BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership.
